abstractText: Basin information is gathered prior to and during the course of the survey. Some of this information (primarily map work and regional classification) must be collected in the office. Most of this information is not the responsibility of the field crews.However, relevant comments by the survey crews should be included in their Field Books and on the Data Sheets. These summaries are used to group and classifystreams and to provide general information for the final stream reports.
title: Stream Habitat Survey- Pre Field Season Office Work v1.0
